website_summaries.verdict: Shorten dryer time with this great value blow drying spray that tames frizz and flyaways.
pros: Cuts your hair drying time in half
cons: Those with fine hair may find this to be too heavy

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Helps my blow out go faster and makes my hair silky, plus smells great. BUT a little goes a long way and if you use too much you will get a bit of a greasy look especially on the crown where my hair is finer. For thick & coarse hair I’m sure it’s not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Must have hair product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I color my hair every 5-6 weeks and inbetween root touch ups. With that, straightening, and blow drying my medium long hair had a tendency to become course and the humidity wreaked havoc when I use to step outside. After using this product not only does my hair dry faster but it leaves a smooth, fall into place finish that I couldn't get otherwise. It protects my hair from the heat of the straightener, my hair never looked better. I buy ahead to not ever run out of this product. Don't overspray or you may get a oily look but quick light sprays, then brush thru.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa T

customer_reviews.title: A must-purchase
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty magical. My stylist recommended it to me a year or so ago, and I've been using it before blow-drying my hair ever since. I have to admit that I don't know 100% of what it does -- I just know that it makes my hair look SO much better when the blow-dry is done as opposed to what it would look like if I hadn't used it. I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Balance seems to be the key with this product. The right amount and my locks are silky smooth and soft, over spray a little and I'm left greasy and oily. Overall (once I got the balance down) I like this products results and have recommended it to many friends.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: I have fine, normal hair and this spray helps with detangling ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller 1.7oz just to try it because it is one of the top rated heat protectorants on Ulta's website. I have fine, normal hair and this spray helps with detangling while blow drying as well as smoothing out fly-aways. I only give it 4 stars because it doesn't extend the style-- it usually makes me greasy halfway into the next day, but i do like the initial results. I might try this is conjunction Living Proof's style extender which is my favorite one.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ander

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells like heaven! It is so light
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells like heaven! It is so light. It doesn't leave my hair feeling oily and weighted down. My hair stays shiny and frizz free even with the heat of the blow-dryer and straightener. This stuff really protects your hair! This is my go-to heat protectant. Couldn't recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: MrsJones

customer_reviews.title: Long hair dried in 4 min 30 sec 🙌🏼😮
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how great this stuff is!! I have thick, fine hair that falls to my mid/lower back and with this spray I was able to COMPLETELY dry it in 4 minutes and 30 seconds!!!! Granted my hair was in a towel for 20 minutes after my shower, but still! I also have naturally oily hair (wash daily) and this does not make it worse, but leaves my hair feeling silky smooth!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Oily Mess!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. I have thin/fine hair and this literally makes my head look like I grabbed a cup of bacon grease and rubbed it all over my hair. If you have thin hair, avoid this product like the plague!
customer_reviews.author: Shaye

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: In Love! I used this product for the first time today and I'm hooked. I have short, coarse, dry, wavy and very thick hair, that gets frizzy with the slightest touch of humidity. For my hairstyle I straighten it daily. This stuff cut my drying time in half, made my hair very manageable, soft and shiny. The smell is delightful too. Hair still looks great at the end of the day. Buy this stuff now, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: llm11973

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Nice Scent.
customer_reviews.text: This spray is absolutely wonderful. It works very well and does not leave any residue on the hot iron if you choose to use it with that. I love the scent. It keeps your hair smooth and I don't fight the frizz with this one.I use it with my hot air brush as well. I highly recommend this product..
customer_reviews.author: S. Runyon

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS APPARENTLY A "NO RETURN" POLICY ON THIS PRODUCT. I COULDN'T FIND THIS INFORMATION ON THE AD BEFORE PURCHASING. NOR DID I RECEIVE A REFUND OF ANY KIND OR AN OFFER OF A COUPON. I DIDN'T LIKE THE WAY THIS PRODUCT MADE MY HAIR FEEL, IT DIDN'T SHORTEN DRYING TIME AND I DID NOT LIKE THE SMELL.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kipgen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would for the product. Customer service was awesome with a refund but the product did absolutely nothing except extend my blow dry time...sorry guys...this stuff is basically some oily water?
customer_reviews.author: paykensay

customer_reviews.title: is AMAZING! The smell is light
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this stuff, as with most Kenra products, is AMAZING! The smell is light, not over powering. I'm not sure my hair dries any faster but I do feel it protects from the heat because my hair is much softer, less dry feeling after heat styling when I use it. It is authentic and better priced than Ulta!
customer_reviews.author: k m

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly.
customer_reviews.text: This product smells nice and detangles my hair well; however, it is oily, so you don’t want to spray a bunch of it on. The first time I used it, I thought it was like other heat protectant I’ve used in the past and liberally sprayed it on my bangs. They were so oily and weighed down, I had to wash my hair again and start over. When used very sparingly, this doesn’t happen as much, but my hair does seem to smoke a bit more when using a flat iron after applying this.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget D.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, unless you like static electricity!
customer_reviews.text: I blow dry my hair about 3 times a week. I’m always looking for a product that will protect my hair and allow it to lay smooth. This did nothing except give it static electricity! No matter what type of brush or comb I used my hair felt thin, wispy, and made it impossible to style. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good for saving time drying hair
customer_reviews.text: Found this through an Amazon site I follow as a deal. Decided to order it to see if it I could save time drying my hair. My hair is longer (not super long) and not think. It typically takes closer to 10 minutes to dry my hair. I've been using this for over a week now. I've definitely been saving time drying my hair. I'm now spending 5 minutes drying my hair. I don't like to put products in my hair - they usually make my hair feel weird. This spray doesn't leave any type of residue in my hair after drying. I will definitely continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: imapayne

customer_reviews.title: Empty Bottles
customer_reviews.text: This issue is with the packaging and less about the actual product. I received the two bottles and one had completely leaked out while the other was half full, making everything an oily mess. There are no cracks in the bottle, it seems like the both caps were loose. It smells good, but that's all I can say at this point. I would recommend putting the bottle in a zip lock bag if you're traveling, since this would ruin everything since it's so oily.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Actually think it works
customer_reviews.text: I have long and super thick hair so listen to me. I hate washing my hair because most of the time that means I will have to dry it. Because I have thick hair, I sit down while I dry my hair and take arm resting breaks too. I think this stuffy actually cuts time down a little. I can make it through drying my hair now without breaks. It smells good too. Give it a shot and see what you think.
customer_reviews.author: ls

customer_reviews.title: Strongly advise against using this
customer_reviews.text: This did not help reduce the time it took to dry my hair. Most importantly, this product totally dried out my hair and made it feel like straw. I tried it several time and each attempt resulted in brittle hair. Each time I didn't use it, my hair felt healthy. I strongly caution again wasting your money on this product. I will say that it smells good, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mucic

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My hairstylist at Ulta sprayed it on my hair after we bleached it to help with the drying process and keep my hair silky. I honestly didn't think it would make a differenc at first. My hair is think and long. (Rests below my bra-line). This spray made my hair feel silky and on top of that, the smell reminds me of the scent of caramel. I now order this every month. My hair requires quite a bit of product, but it works amazing. It maintains volume while smoothing out tangles and it protects my hair so that I can get beautiful curls that stay all day. This product is an all in one!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle sokoll

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair feel weird
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this protects my hair but it leaves my hair feeling gummy or like there's product build up on my clean and blow dried hair. I follow the directions by applying to clean and damp hair before styling but my hair feels gross after.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hiney

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was exited to give this product a shot, unfortunately it does not help with the hair freeze as promoted and I can not return it either (return not available).
customer_reviews.author: M.G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blow out
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely cannot say enough great things about this product! I have fine, straight hair that I used to let air dry before styling. However, I have started to get wavy, frizzy looking ends when I allow it to air dry. I bought this spray because I have never been disappointed with Kenra products. The smell is divine! It cuts my blow dry time down a ton and leaves my hair so soft and perfect. I look like I came from the salon. For my straight, fine hair this isn’t too heavy that it weighs it down or gets greasy. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair
customer_reviews.text: I have what I consider "sensitive hair". I get greasy easily, can't handle hard water, thin strands, and NO body or volume. In always Leary of new products but I love Kenra Hair Spray so I gave this a try. I LOVE IT!! It makes my hair so soft and the scent is amazing. I don't know how, but it actually does cut the blow dry time at least in half. Highly recommended product I will make all of my friends try.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased the larger size honestly, but wanted to give it a try first before I really committed. I typically use heat on my hair almost every single day between hair dryers, straighteners and curling irons. I seriously LOVE the smell of it, the lightness of it since it's a mist more than a spray, it is a bit oily if you get any of it on your floor or body. But overall I'm impressed with how fast my hair dries when I use it, how good it smells, how soft and shiny my hair is after and just happy to use something that is protecting my locks.
customer_reviews.author: A Parker

customer_reviews.title: Cuts drying time big time!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My hair usually take 20-30 min to dry. With this product it dried in like 10 min, maybe less! It was insane! I was so shocked! Also it smells amazing, and makes your hair feel sooooo soft. It is also a heat protectant so you don’t have to add another product. Really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: MUST have for naturally curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Not enough great words for this product. I have naturally curly hair and started about two years ago with keritan treatments. When i read reviews I wondered how this could dry hair faster and although i still dont know why, what I do know it that it WORKS! I only spend about a minute drying hair, my hair is so soft! Naturally curly hair can be dry and fly away. This product is my new best friend! It’s not heavy on hair, helps prevent frizziness and makes your hair so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us on Gray hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have gray hair you know that blow drying your hair can often times turn your hair yellow and dull. Well if you have a problem with your hair turning yellow this is the product for you. I have long straight gray/white hair and never blow dry my hair without this. It has been a real game changer for me. Now I can dry my hair with confidence and know that I will never have to worry about the dreaded yellow hair again. I have my daughter to thank for telling me about this product she has long thick dark curly hair and uses it too.
customer_reviews.author: bellicent

customer_reviews.title: Too oily for me
customer_reviews.text: While it did the job it said it would do, it isn’t worth it to me. I used it for about 2 weeks, applying while I was already dressed in long sleeves. I started breaking out on my face (I never get pimples) and feeling really oily but couldn’t figure out why. One day when I applied it with a tank top on, I saw how oily my shoulders were. Discontinued use about 2 weeks ago and washed pillow cases and sheets and haven’t had an issue since it cleared up. So again, it does do what it says and if you’re not one to get oily from a product, then you’ll love it. But not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Mamulski

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Super impressed. Definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just started using this product recently. I just blow dried my hair just now and felt the need to write a review. My hair looks incredible! No frizz. Half the drying time. I also used my new Revlon hot brush with it. The results are professional. My hair is incredibly soft and silky. I'm super impressed. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: For at least 10 years I have been spending upwards of $60 per bottle of “Oribé Royal Blowout” spray. I never thought I would EVER find anything as good as that spray - until I saw a BuzzFeed post mentioning this. OMG - this is the stuff! I don’t use it to blow dry my hair - I use it like I did w/ the Oribé spray - as a heat protectant for when I curl my hair. It helps me to keep my hair straight and frizz-free when I use it before the curling iron. Def worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Slekker

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, especially if you have dry hair!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thermal hair protectant! I use it when blow drying and flat ironing my hair. I have thick hair that tends to get dry, especially on the ends. This stuff gives my wispy little ends a bit more weight and aids in keeping the frizz and flyaways down. I’ve tried Aussie, OGX, Bed Head, Redken, and a few other drug store brands, and this will always be my go to. I use it in tandem with Paul Mitchell smoothing serum to help keep my crazy wavy frizzy hair from turning into a mess by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Morguepie

customer_reviews.title: Smells beachy!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so beachy and delicious! It makes my hair so soft and shiny too. The only thing I have to be careful with is when spraying it, if it gets on your skin (shoulders) it feels really slick/oily so I’m afraid it’ll create stains on my clothing. So I just wipe my shoulders off with a towel before getting dressed. Not a big deal for me, but may be offputting for others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS "THE ONE"! Controls frizz/THE freshest scent/heat w/o burnt hair smell!
customer_reviews.text: Great for heat-treating w/o burnt hair smell (especially after the first day), addictively fresh scent, THE BEST for controlling frizz! My new fave - I finally found THE ONE - now all the half-used products in my cabinet will never be finished (at least not by me...looking for a sucker to give them all to!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like baby oil
customer_reviews.text: Feels like baby oil. Makes my hair soft, but slightly greasy. I have a lot of fine hair so, I try to add texture any chance I get. This stuff made my hair limp for 3-4 frays after use. It does make dry time quicker than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna MikiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser used this on my hair during my last appointment and I was so taken with the smell alone I asked what she used and immediately went to look it up on Amazon and purchased. I also love weightless it feels and because I use a lot of heat styling products on my hair, this product has been essential in my routine. I’ve been using this for a few months now and I really can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Stock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent de-fluff spray
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally blond with grey slightly wavy hair. If I work at it and put a lot of curling products in it will be mildly curly. But if I just let it air dry it not only takes hours but then it looks very boring and lackluster. Normally when I blow dry my hair many frizzies around my roots. It’s not cute. This is the best before heat, anti frizz with humidity control product I’ve had outside the salon. And way less than the pricey salon stuff they use there. Love love love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my hair so smooth and shiny after a blowout. I didn’t notice a huge difference in drying time, but my hair is super thick and hard to dry anyway. I did notice a huge difference in the poofiness in my hair. My hair was much smoother and shiny after a few squirts. It even seemed to last into the next day. No residue or stickiness, and it made my hair very soft. The smell is good too, but not like the Kenra silkening mist which is my favorite. I highly recommend using the two products together. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A Leverette

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good, But I Didn’t Notice a Huge Increase In Drying Time
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, but I didn’t get that hard core fast drying effect that others seemed to experience. I have very long and thick hair. It ended up feeling a bit oily after I used it too. Could be user error. I’ll try it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anne

customer_reviews.title: No difference and not a great smell
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought this for all the great reviews and the price is a lot less than in the stores. I used it like three times now and..first, the smell is not great. Not a deal breaker though. But I don’t think it dries my hair any faster or protects it any more than before I used it. I can’t return it so I’ll try it again but I might just toss it after that..not sure if it’s really the same formula as sold in stores but definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gmack

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this smells!! It’s also cut down on drying time. I throw my hair into a turbo twisty when I get out of the shower and wear it in that for about 15 min. while I get dressed and do my makeup. I then spray my hair with this and dry it. I have naturally curly hair and this helps detangle while I dry. It used to take me about 25-30 minutes to dry and style my hair, now it takes about 15! I will continue to use this, and I’ve even purchased it for friends as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: SEY

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product!!! With the extra $$$
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for s thermo protector for when I blow dry and flat iron my hair...BUT...more importantly something that smelled good and didn’t leave my hair feeling greasy and flat. This product not only smells fabulous but it gets the job done as far as protecting my hair from heat damage and reduced the time it takes to dry my thick wavy hair. Highly recommend this product and all Kenra products they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: What Voodoo Magic is this? It really does help your hair dry faster! The scent is lovely, it protects your hair well and my hair feels and looks so good!!! A little goes a long way. Too much and your hair WILL look and feel greasy. You have to experiment with what amount works well with your hair. I just spray about 5 pumps into my hand, rub my hands together then run my hand through my hair. I then comb it through and blow dry. This is the method that I found works best for my type of hair. Try it, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid T.

customer_reviews.title: Did absolutely nothing!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product, especially that I bought it based on the great reviews. It did nothing to my hair to tame the frizz and the smell isn't nice either. The smell is tolerable at best, but no change in the frizz at all. I wanted to return it but Amazon won't allow the return due to "flammable material". So be careful before your throw away your $20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair look dry and frizzy
customer_reviews.text: This is just my experience, my hair did dry faster but it was dry and frizzy. Because elf that it was difficult to style that I was happy with. Usually I can go 2 days in between washing my hair but the ends of my hair got so frizzy and appeared fried that I washed it the next day. I used the product a hand full of times to make sure I gave it a fair chance but it increasingly became evident it isn’t for me. I should say I have colored hair in addition to blow drying and straightening several times a week. So my hair has stressors to begin with but this product didn’t work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: rdberan

customer_reviews.title: Heat Protectant Spray
customer_reviews.text: The Kenra line of hair products is one of my go to's depending on the season and my hair. Now that I'm constantly blowdrying and straightening, I asked my stylist and she recommended a heat protectant in a product line that I was already using. This has a pump mist spray, a great scent like all Kenra products do, and absolutely does prevent the hair from becoming overly dry from excess styling. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is highly diluted. I just used this brand at the salon and loved it, so I ordered my own. I just used it and it is super runny and did NOT make my hair smell or feel like the product at the salon. It didn't shorten my dry time either, like the salon did. It looks like someone poured water in it and the sprayer on the bottle is broken. so I have to literally pour it I to my hand and rub it on my hair. Not happy at all. Will definitely go to Ulta from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Anderton

customer_reviews.title: Curly or thick hair? You'll love this!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks my world, unfortunately it's super expensive at Ulta so I had to use it sparingly on my three pounds of hair until I realized that it was sold on Amazon for such a good price! I have naturally curly hair that is very thick, and whenever I want to blow-dry it or straighten it, this product has become a staple in my routine. It smells heavenly, cuts the drying time and makes my hair so smooth and shiny. You also don't need a whole lot, so the big bottle has lasted me months and I use it once a week!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about trying this product out. It definitely does help with drying faster. I typically spend 12-15 mts blow drying hair. I timed it with this product, in 5 minutes it was dry, it took me an additional 2 minutes or so to kinda style it. Smells really nice. I uploaded a before and after picture of hair
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue if this product is good for my hair or not. The amount of product Is very small for the price, which I expected. What I did not expect is that it would come in the cheapest spray bottle ever invented. Call me crazy, but I expect a pricey product in a spray bottle to actually SPRAY! I tried every which way I could think of to get it to work. I may try to transfer the stuff to something else or try to pour a small amount on my hands, but I should not have to work that hard.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy the kenra spray because I have tried so many that were ok at best. I finally decided to get it and honestly wasn't expecting these results. I was able to dry and style my hair in 15 minutes as opposed to an hour. I sprayed it on my wet (straight out of the shower) hair and I was impressed with how quickly I could do my hair. I had so many compliments on my hair and it didn't get frizzy throughout the day - not even after the gym. LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Really cuts down on drying time!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how much this spray cut down on my blow drying time. It smells nice and my hair feels clean, bouncy, and soft after use, but not like there's anything extra on my hair, which is what I prefer (I don't like feeling "product" on my hair). A little goes a long way - you just need a few spritzes to get the job done. I will continue to buy this for as long as Kenra makes it.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was skeptical, I have long, thick hair and it usually takes forever for it to dry...i decided to give it a try after reading so many great reviews and I had to come back to say that the reviews are totally on point. It took me only 4....4!!!!minutes to dry my hair, that is CRAZY. I didn't love the scent but when my hair is dry the scent is gone. It is a great product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way. LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has THE BEST price on this. Unless you’re a stylist and can buy through supply store. Smells great and leaves hair shiny after using air brush dryer. Bought a small bottle and decided I liked it and would stick w it. $15 on Amazon or $37 at beauty stores. A little goes a long way. Couple of sprays around the head and comb through. Too much makes it greasy
customer_reviews.author: Cooper's mom

customer_reviews.title: I'm keeping this
customer_reviews.text: my keeping a hair product is a big deal because nothing makes my hair happy. I'm keeping this and i purchased another kendra product that leaves my hair so soft. This has a scent, but I like it and it does dissipate after you blow dry. Also when Im being shot in commercials the makeup and hair people often have kendra so you know it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: So, I have naturally curly hair that I attempt to straighten and it normally works out, with a decent straightener and some argan oil. That is...until you add humidity to the mix. Then it's just a mess. This product does wonders - seriously! Not only did it decrease the dry time (maybe not by half, but definitely some), but it also protected my hair from humidity. It also smells good! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: em77

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Blow Dry Spray for a couple of years now, and CANNOT live without it! Your hair dries with the blowdryer in literally a fraction of the time. Leaves a really nice, swing-y finish to hair, plus it smells amazing! It's not cheap, but I've tried the cheap brands....and it's no comparison. Just fork over the money--you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Graciebird

customer_reviews.title: Please help! Love the product but arrives damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but the Item damaged upon arrival. It was sealed w plastic however when I took the plastic cover off, the lead wasn’t sealed and I lost half the product when the plastic cane off from pressure during mailing and not closed properly from sender. Anything you can do?! Item isn’t returnable and quite expensive
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is legit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! This stuff works amazing!!! I spray this stuff on my wet hair then run my hair brush dryer through my hair and it only takes about 14 minutes to completely dry my long thick wavy hair. It leaves my hair so smooth and silky soft and gives it a natural shine. It also smells amazing! It’s expensive, but I usually catch it on sale for about $15 and that’s when I stock up!
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: This really does work!!
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly skeptics that this product would actually do what it promises. But I am so impressed—-it truly does cut the drying time of my hair in half, which is amazing!! It has a wonderful light scent and seems to help my hair style stay longer. It’s a bit pricey, but I can’t imagine ever going without it!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Weighed my hair down
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was so excited about this product. It smells amazing!! But... I have fine, thick hair. The first time I used it I thought maybe I sprayed too much because it weighed down and gave a greasy feel. Tried it a second time and used only 3 pumps. Nope, still weighed it down. I was bummed because I really loved the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Cmb

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: It cuts the drying time in half if not more. I spray my hair left , right and middle and that's it. 3 TIMES! I had this for a LONGGGGG TIME so dont think its pricey. Little goes a long way. Just towel try your hair and spray this and its magic. It smells like an elegant perfume . I will repurchase this forever. It's in my beauty regime.
customer_reviews.author: Hubish

customer_reviews.title: This is a better price here than Ulta cosmetics!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this before at Ulta. I will never buy anything at Ulta again! I started doing comparisons, and this was about $10 more at Ulta! Why, so they can give you points and then you'll come back and spend more? I LOVE the smell of this product and feel like it helps my hair to be soft and blow dry well. I have long blonde hair below my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: ALLESANDRA

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of the Scent
customer_reviews.text: I either did not read the correct reviews or I just overlooked the fact that this smells like pure vanilla extract! It is horrible. I have a very sensitive 'sniffer' and could smell it before I even took the plastic off of the bottle. I did not get past the smell to even try the product. This may be a great product, the review say it is, but if you are smell-sensitive, especially to something sweet, please do not waste your money as I did. Will have to see if I can find someone in my family or friend to donate it to. Will just stick with my KMS Moisture Repair Leave-in-Conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the frizz down
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my hair. I have super curly hair and if I don’t use it 1. It helps me dry it quicker 2. It takes down frizz 3. All the product I use to keep the curls curly makes my hair stiff and this product helps it to be soft yet keeps the hold from the other products. Sometimes this isn’t available on amazon and I refuse to pay a lot for it so I’ll try other items like ms universe set the stage blow dry spray but Many don’t work so I stick with what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Buck

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Cuts blow dry time in half, leaves my hair feeling healthy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I am SUPER STOKED with this blow dry spray. My hair dresser has been using this on my for years and I finally purchased it. I wish I hadn’t waited so long. It cuts my blow dry time down by at least 40%. My hair is much smoother and healthier since I have been using. I like that it protects my hair from the heat of the blowdryer and my flat iron. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mist!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much that I came back for more!!! The spray comes out in a perfect mist! With other leave in products I often have to spay the product in my hand first so as not to apply it too heavily; this is not the case with Kenya! I do notice that my hair dries faster and is so much easier to brush through!
customer_reviews.author: Torry

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but not sure my hair dries faster
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got long, very curly hair that I blow out strait and it usually takes about 45 minutes to an hour to dry. On the plus side, it does detangle fairly well and does make your hair really shinny. I was very happy with how light and well styled it looked but disappointed because I can’t say I noticed any difference in dry time, if I did it was marginal. However, I do like how shinny my hair looked so I’ll probably continue to use it. I’ll update if I notice a reduction in dry time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless purchase that leave weird yuck on hair
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. It leaves a really yucky film on your hair. It feels really weird and kinda sticks whenever you touch your hair. Maybe it speeds up blowing time. That’s a big maybe as si don’t think it did. So I gave it two stars. But even if it does it isn’t worth the gross feeling on your hair all day. Wish I had not missed the return window for this. I kept trying to give it a chance and should have returned it right away.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysOnLake6

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t disappoint and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: First off product is the real deal. Arrived ahead of time. Smell is amazing. This size product is on sale at the beauty stores around town and Amazon and Prime still beat their price by several dollars. I’ve used this for years and the Platinum Collection is the best! Protects my hair from the heat and adds a silky shine to it. Thank you Kenra!
customer_reviews.author: 2CuteKidzinCali

customer_reviews.title: I realized it's amazing when I ran out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago, and just ran out of product yesterday. I liked it, but I didn't realize how well it was working until today when I dried my hair without it. The end result was dull, puffy, and coarse. This spray has been making a difference! I can't wait until the new bottle comes! And I won't have to wait long because we do Prime. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Italoamericana

customer_reviews.title: Smells so so so good!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good!! I love it! I shake the bottle and then spray it on my hair before blow drying. Days I don't wash my hair, but the ends are a little wet from the shower I will still use it on my ends the blow dry. It really makes my fine hair soft. Not oily at all. I'm loving everything from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it was going to be
customer_reviews.text: Has kind of a light cocina smell, not very strong. It does make a difference in drying time i did notice, if you spray a little to much in I do like that your hair doesn’t look greasy like some products. Unfortunately it does not detangle hair and it does not keep it from getting frizzy, and I didn’t notice a difference in smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and works even better than it smells!
customer_reviews.text: This blow-dry spray smells amazing and a little definitely goes a long way. I have naturally curly/wavy hair that can become unmanageable in the humidity but using this product before blow drying help reduce my overall styling time (if I want to straighten or curl my hair). I even spray -a very little amount- on my brush or hands to comb through my hair after it's been styled to help contain any frizz I may have.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa P

customer_reviews.title: Tangle and residue free!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the what you buy in a salon supply store, this is a great value. However, this is missing some ingredients that are in the product when purchased in a salon supply store for twice the price. Still works and smells great! I love how this DOES NOT make my hair sticky or tangled during blow-drying. It brushes nicely and once dry, feels as if there is nothing there.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi Moen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair, and wear it that way most of the time. I wanted something good to protect it from heat when I did decide to blow dry it. THIS IS IT! Smells amazing and made my hair silky soft!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle lasted me 10 months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1.7 ounce of this to try for the first time. It lasted me ten months using it once a week! This stuff works so well, smells great, and doesn’t take a lot to work. Will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Call

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Kenra line! The product arrived as described and packaged to ensure no damage. My bottle was taped so there was no way the cap would slip off during shipping - smart! Another star is that Kenra Professional Platinum Blow-Dry Spray was available through Prime (I seldom buy anything that isn't available through Prime). When my hair is still wet, I apply Kenra - I can use as much as I want without it ending up with a greasy texture or appearing greasy. I wish the Kenra line was more affordable. Ordering from Amazon, however, is still cheaper than going through my local salon for this product.
customer_reviews.author: dawnvolk

customer_reviews.title: Makes my Curls flat, texture is gross on my medium to course hair
customer_reviews.text: Seriously use VERY SPARINGLY of you have issues with greasy hair. Which is a plus side since you won't go through it very quickly. The huge downside is that my curls were flat consistently after using this product and texture was gross. Will be switching it up. Not worth the price and hype.
customer_reviews.author: Amazin Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it protect my hair from hair styling tool's heat, way it leaves hair feeling soft and shinny sealed the deal for me. This is by far the only product that prevents freeziness, and I've tried a ton including professional salon products, but fact that it's cruelty free/not tested on animals gain this spray my loyalty. It's worked amazingly for me, so can totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zue B.

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: Holy Grail when combined with Kenra Perfect blowout. I have fine hair(but lots of it)cut in a chin length bob. It is fairly straight but does wave up after sleeping on it. When using these 2 products my style held thru the second day with only needing to run my fingers thru it to un-tousle. I have used different styling cremes in the past, most recently living proof, but this is the only one that has held my style overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Four to five sprays on my long-ish color-treated hair before blowdrying, and it looks smooth and really does dry faster. I was skeptical as most products leave residue and my hair ends up looking dirty, but not this. Experiment with the amount you use because it can be overdone. Smells good, too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emkay

customer_reviews.title: Love this blow dry spray
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow dry spray. I cannot say with certainty that it speeds up blow dry time because my hair takes forever to blow dry and I rarely spend the time to do it. I use after shower when hair's wet and also to touch up hair between washes. Keeps it smooth, absorbs nicely, & never makes my hair look or feel greasy. It's like a dry oil. Smells fabulous too! The spray applicator distributes product evenly. I buy the cute small travel sized one when traveling because I cannot do without the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi RamoneTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Protects curls!
customer_reviews.text: Used it immediately after shower while hair was still wet then blow dried my hair and straightened it. It did help my hair to dry faster the scent is nice and when I washed my hair back a few days later I noticed my curls had no damage. Without using this product my curls would be limp and take about a week to come back to life but this product definitely protected them. Very happy with this purchase. It was worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cdodson

customer_reviews.title: Easy Care
customer_reviews.text: Have been through so MANY products for fine, curly (3b-3c) hair but I have found a keeper. It takes less time to diffuse dry my hair (med length) and it has come out great every time so far. Going to try at the beach, that will be real test. So far, So Great!
customer_reviews.author: NatCurl

customer_reviews.title: Too heavily perfumed
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use this product because it has an overpowering scent. I wanted to return it but returns are not accepted on this item. Beware if you don't care for heavy perfume scent. Otherwise it might be acceptable but I will have to shampoo my hair to remove the smell.
customer_reviews.author: soozeqsh7

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same quality as I get from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same quality as I get from my stylist. Pay the extra cost in a salon-it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Griffin

customer_reviews.title: You need this! Super soft hair  and cuts drying time!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is seriously magic. I have crazy thick hair and I hate drying it because it just takes so long. I separate it, pin it up and spray the bottom half and dry and then do the top. It’s perfect! Agree with some of the other folks that said you need to find the perfect amount... too much you could be greasy. But you’ll only do that once. Regardless it smells amazing and your hair will be so soft! Get this!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Thick Hair!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I never want to run out of it! My hair is thick and course with highlights. That said, if you have thin or fine hair, this may be too oily and weigh your hair down. But if your hair is thick, coarse, wavy, frizzy or curly, give it a try! You will not be disappointed! The scent is absolutely fabulous and your hair will shine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Hair Greasy
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best hair protector. It leaves your hair feelings a little weird and greasy if you put too much, not like others that you spray on and it dries normally. The smell is a very strong vanilla Esq scent that isn't for everybody. It does help my hair to dry faster when blow drying but other than that I can't really use it for flattening or curling because it leaves the residue.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Yes this product feels and smells nice, but it does not cut down the drying time by 50%. It takes just as long, and makes my hair frizzy after styled. It leaves greasy residue both on your hair and anywhere else in your bathroom that the over mist has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten De Santiago

customer_reviews.title: My hair dresser got me hooked.
customer_reviews.text: Smell is heavenly, last forever. Definitely a nice sheen/feel to hair with this product. She said towel dry. Brush. Spray to cover. Begin blow drying. I’ve also used on dry hair that was going to be using a hot iron to straighten. Excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this all the time at Ulta and it costs almost twice what I paid here. This product dries my hair quickly and and I notice my hair feels soft. It’s my go to since I have thick hair and drying it in the morning takes a while. This product dries my hair in less than 5 minutes in comparison to 10 or more minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: NOT returnable!!
customer_reviews.text: So this product is expensive and despite being offered as an amazon prime item it is NOT returnable. This is listed absolutely no where on the advertisement/item description. The product does NOT decrease drying time. IF anything it increased it. Really feel ripped off because that I wasn't told this was not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was buying because it would help with frizz.... made it worse. This stuff dried out my hair. I have curly/wavy hair and this product left it feeling dry and frizzed out. You can't return it; waste of money. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Char55

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge fan of the scent, too coconutty for me, but....it works great. I live in the Northeast and it is either humid and hot or rainy and misty, this stuff works great. Smooth, shiny and not greasy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DPerls51

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have found for blow drying my long hair.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product. I have very fine long straight hair. Other products are too heavy or leave my hair fuzzy when the weather is humid or raining. Not this stuff though. It leaves my hair smooth and the tropical scent is so nice. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: tspaci8

customer_reviews.title: A Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how or why, but this stuff really does reduce drying time. When you have long or damaged hair, this can be a game-changer for sure. One thing I will say, do NOT overdo it on this! I have long hair (middle of my back) and I do two sprays underneath and three sprays on top. That's it. Any more and it looks too greasy and you will have to wash your hair every day which you shouldn't do with long hair (or any hair, really). Silky smooth and less drying time. It does what it says and the bottle lasts a long time. Like I said, a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: buffalogal

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoothing spray!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blowout spray! Mays hair silky but not weighted. Doesn’t take a lot so it lasts several months.
customer_reviews.author: LLMgram

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was a bit skeptical about this product. I have very, very thick, coarse, long hair. As soon as I sprayed this on my hair it immediately started feeling drier. When it was time to blow dry my hair it still took a while, but not as long as it normally does. My hair was soft and sleek. It smells amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

product_meta.title: Kenra Platinum Blow-Dry Spray
product_meta.description:
Size:6.8 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Kenra Platinum Blow-Dry Spray dramatically decreases blow-dry time and provides intense heat protection from damage and breakage. This lightweight formulation detangles, smoothes, and softens while eliminating frizz and resisting humidity for long-lasting, healthy looking results. Ingredients are Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Sodium Laneth 40 Maleate/Styrene Sulfonate Copolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Parfum/Fragrance, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernal Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil.

BRAND STORY
Kenra Platinum. Elevate your artistry with high-end formulas, fragrances, and packaging - for unmatched styling & haircare. Stay on-trend with the latest ingredients & exclusive technologies to create truly impressive looks.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
